title: Getting counter picked by Rumble is very vexing.
body: Rumble isn't an OP champion but one whose kit makes unfun to lane against. Name me a champion that is more annoying to lane against.

replies.body: Exactly, Rumble doesn't qualify for the status of unfun.

The mobility is frustrating because it takes away the safety of other characters' mobility (and flash) because it is so much more than theirs. Ward hopping is a big part of that.

Maybe I used too tight of a definition for unfun, but yours is still too loose.

A good Rumble will stay in the 50-99 zone.
He's really annoying since he can just spam Q as soon as it's up cd, push you into tower then stay at max range and keep Q'ing you while you're getting the ranged creeps.

i would live to see someone pick rumble into my vlad

If you are having trouble with Rumble in lane, you should work on your playstyle. Whining about how unfun it is to get beat by his kit won't help you learn how to beat it.

Here are some tips:

* Use your minions to block the harpoons
* watch his heat, when he's in the yellow that's the danger zone and you should stay farther away from him
* fight him when he's in the grey or in the red as then he lacks a lot of his power.
* fight him when his abilities are on cooldown, don't let him harass you for free.
* Buy early MR and extra sustain via potions or items.
